title: O&I
description: Operations and Intelligence is responsible for constructing applications designed to assist command post operations and intelligence staff teams across all echelons.

title: S&S
description: Soldiers and Sustainment focuses on the development of applications tailored to the specific Soldiers' needs and the sustainment of the Army.

title: RAS
description: Robotics and Autonomous Systems is tasked with overseeing human machine integration.

title: I&P
description: Infrastructure and Platforms is responsible for ensuring that all AI Incubator personnel have the necessary hardware and software tools for their work.

title: SOF-C
description: Special Operations Forces - Cyber is responsible for developing applications that support special operations and cyber forces.

title: OPS
description: Military and Civilian staff (including operations, resource management, and security) that enable development and integration activities across AI2C.
